neutronStars.name: Crab Pulsar
neutronStars.description: The Crab Pulsar is a neutron star located in the constellation Taurus. It is the remnant of a supernova explosion observed in 1054 AD.

neutronStars.name: Vela Pulsar
neutronStars.description: The Vela Pulsar is a neutron star located in the Vela supernova remnant. It is one of the brightest known radio sources in the sky.

neutronStars.name: PSR J1748-2446ad
neutronStars.description: PSR J1748-2446ad is a millisecond pulsar located in the globular cluster Terzan 5. It is one of the fastest spinning neutron stars known.
